results.title: Update on Statin Treatment in Patients with Neuropsychiatric Disorders
results.text_hl: The positive effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Autistic_Disorder</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001321 @@@autism disorders@@@ have been evaluated in only a small number of clinical trials.
